T08D4106-2:19b-32: zhugs pa nyid kyi bye brag gzhan bstan pa'i phyir
T08D4106-2:19b-33: zhag bdun la ni rigs thun pa la'o zhes bya
T08D4106-2:19b-34: ba smras te / spang ba gzhan dag la ni
T08D4106-2:19b-35: rnag nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa nyid 'chang bar
T08D4106-2:19b-36: gtogs pa spyi'i shan nyid kyang 'chang bar gtogs pa
T08D4106-2:19b-38: 'bral bar gtogs pa gzhan spyi'i shan nyid kyang 'bral bar gtogs pa gzhan spyi la 'byung /
T08D4106-2:19b-39: 'jog par gtogs pa gzhan spyi'i shan nyid kyang 'jog
T08D4106-2:19b-40: par gtogs pa gzhan spyil 'byung ba la sogs pa
T08D4106-2:20a-0: zhag bdun pa 'di la ni rang @20a * //
T08D4106-2:20a-1: nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa nyid zhag bdun par gtogs pa spyi la 'byung ba ma yin gyi /
T08D4106-2:20a-2: rigs mthun pa nyid la 'byung ste /
T08D4106-2:20a-3: 'di lta ste rang nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa
T08D4106-2:20a-4: nyid mar du gtogs pa'i ni mar phyis rnyed pa
T08D4106-2:20a-6: 'bra mar la sogs pa dag mi 'gyur ba dang ;
T08D4106-2:20a-7: de bzhin du rang nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa
T08D4106-2:20a-8: nyid 'bru mar du gtogs pa'i ni 'bru mar phyir
T08D4106-2:20a-9: rnyed pa la 'byung ba nyid yin gyi mar la
T08D4106-2:20a-10: sogs pa dag la mi 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T08D4106-2:20a-11: 'dir gzhung ni rnam par 'byed pa las dge slong gis tshes la mar rnyed la /
T08D4106-2:20a-12: des tshes gnyis la gzhan zhig kyang rnyed par gyur
T08D4106-2:20a-13: na dge slong des snga ma shos bza' bar bya
T08D4106-2:20a-14: zhing / phyi ma shos gtang bar bya ba 'am /
T08D4106-2:20a-18: gzhan la sbyin par mi byed na zhag brgyad pa'i
T08D4106-2:20a-19: skya rengs shar na spang ba'i ltung byed do zhes
T08D4106-2:20a-21: dge slong gis gsog 'jog gi spang ba'i ltung byed
T08D4106-2:20a-22: byung la ji srid du spang ba'i dngos po las
T08D4106-2:20a-23: ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags par ltung bzed
T08D4106-2:20a-24: dam chos gos sam dra pa 'am phor bu 'am
T08D4106-2:20a-25: ska rags sam dge sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad
T08D4106-2:20a-26: gang yang rung ba gzhan nye bar 'jog par byed
T08D4106-2:20a-27: na / de yang snga ma'i shugs kyis spang bar 'gyur te /
T08D4106-2:20a-28: de las ltung bar ni mi 'gyur ro //
T08D4106-2:20a-29: gsog 'jog gi spang ba'i ltung byed 'di dang //
T08D4106-2:20a-30: 'og nas gsog 'jog gi ltung byed ces 'byung ba la bye brag ni 'di yod de /
T08D4106-2:20a-31: 'di ni sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs pa
T08D4106-2:20a-32: bza' pa'i phyir bcang ba skya rengs brgyad pa shar
T08D4106-2:20a-33: te gsog 'jog tu gyur pa la /
T08D4106-2:20a-34: spang ba'i ltung byed du rnam par gzhag go //
T08D4106-2:20a-35: 'og ma ni dus su rung ba'i zas bca' ba
T08D4106-2:20a-36: lnga dang bza' ba lnga gsog 'jog tu gyur pa
T08D4106-2:20a-37: zos pa la ltung byed 'ba' zhig tu rnam par
T08D4106-2:20a-38: gzhag go // sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs
T08D4106-2:20a-39: pa bza' ba'i phyir bcang ba skya rengs brgyad pa
T08D4106-2:20a-40: shar ba la na smad pa med do //
T08D4106-2:20a-41: sman zhag bdun pa ni zhun mar dang 'bru mar
T08D4106-2:20a-42: dang sbrang rtsa dang bu ram gyi dbu bdag go
T08D4106-2:20a-43: // zhun mar zhes bya ba ni mar bzhus pa ste bdud rtsi yang de'i khongs su gtogs so //
T08D4106-2:20b-0: 'bru mar zhes bya @20b pa ni 'bru mar nyid de /
T08D4106-2:20b-1: zhag rnam pa lnga po nya'i zhag dang /
T08D4106-2:20b-3: chu srin byis pa gsod kyi zhag dang /
T08D4106-2:20b-5: phag gi zhag dus su bskol /
T08D4106-2:20b-7: dus su byin gyis brlabs pa dag kyang 'di'i khongs su gtogs so //
T08D4106-2:20b-8: sbrang rtsi zhes bya ba ni sbrang bu'i sbrang rtsi'o//
T08D4106-2:20b-9: bu ram dang bu ram gyi dbu ba zhes bya ba ni bu ram nyid de /
T08D4106-2:20b-10: hvags dang li kha ra la sogs pa yang 'di'i khongs su gtogs so //
T08D4106-2:20b-11: sman zhag bdun pa byin len byin pa dang byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ni /
T08D4106-2:20b-12: dge slong nad pas zhag bdun gyi mtha'i dus tshun
T08D4106-2:20b-13: chad du rung gis byin len byas shing byin gyis
T08D4106-2:20b-14: brlabs te bsten par bya ba nyid yin gyi /
T08D4106-2:20b-15: mi na bas ni byin gyis brlab tu yang mi
T08D4106-2:20b-16: rung la gzhan gyis brlabs pa dag bzar yang mi
T08D4106-2:20b-17: rung ngo // sos pa nyid na de dag nad pa'i phyir slong na sbyin no //
T08D4106-2:20b-18: slong ba me dge 'dun gyi sman khang du gzhag par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:20b-19: de dag zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs par cho ga dang sngags ni 'di yin te /
T08D4106-2:20b-20: sman de dag sman pa dang sman pa rab tu
T08D4106-2:20b-21: byung ba dang sman g-yog bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa
T08D4106-2:20b-22: mkhas pa gang yang rung ba'i sa gzhir snga dro
T08D4106-2:20b-24: bza' bar bya ba rung ba ma yin pa lag nyar blangs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:20b-26: nang du zhag lon pa dang /
T08D4106-2:20b-27: dge slong gis btsos pa la sogs pa dang ma 'dres par byas la /
T08D4106-2:20b-28: dge slong nad pas kyang snga dro lag pa bsnyal
T08D4106-2:20b-29: te byin len byas la dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs
T08D4106-2:20b-30: pa rang bzhin du gnas pa lta ba dang mtshan
T08D4106-2:20b-31: mthun pa mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa gcig mdun

T08D4106-2:20b-34: nad pas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:20b-35: tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /

T08D4106-2:20b-37: bdun pa 'di dag bdag dang tshangs pa mtshungs par
T08D4106-2:20b-38: spyod pa rnams kyir bgyi bar zhag bdun par byin
T08D4106-2:20b-39: gyis brlab po // lan gsum du bzlas /
T08D4106-2:20b-40: sde'i rjes la nyan pas thabs yin no zhes brjod par bya /
T08D4106-2:20b-41: nad pas legs so zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:21a-0: de phyin chad zhag bdun gyi bar du byin len ma zhig par byas te rang gis @21a * //
T08D4106-2:21a-2: zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs pa'i nyi ma 'das
T08D4106-2:21a-3: so cog dge slong la nyi ma re re zhing
T08D4106-2:21a-4: deng phan chad du nyi ma dang po 'das te
T08D4106-2:21a-5: deng ni nyi ma gnyis pa lags so zhes bya
T08D4106-2:21a-6: ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:21a-7: zhag brgyad pa'i skya rengs ma shar tshun chad du zos zin cing lhag ma byed na der zad /
T08D4106-2:21a-8: yod na nad pa'i phyir slong ba la sbyin pa'am /
T08D4106-2:21a-9: dge 'dun gyi sman khang du gzhag pa'am /
T08D4106-2:21a-10: bsam pa thag pa nas ltos pa med pa'i sems kyis gzhan la gtang bar bya'o //
T08D4106-2:21a-11: de ltar ma byas par bza' ba'i phyir 'chad na
T08D4106-2:21a-12: skya rengs brgyad pa shar na gsog 'jog tu 'gyur
T08D4106-2:21a-13: zhing spang ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro
T08D4106-2:21a-14: // 'di'i byed pa po ni sman zhag bdun par
T08D4106-2:21a-15: byin gyis brlabs pa bza' ba'i phyir 'chang ba dang
T08D4106-2:21a-16: de dag skya rengs brgyad pa shar te gsog 'jog
T08D4106-2:21a-18: 'di la yan lag bzhis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08D4106-2:21a-19: sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs pa nyid dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-20: rang nyid bza' ba'i phyir dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-21: 'chang ba dang skya rengs brgyad pa shar te gsog 'jog tu gyur pa'o //
T08D4106-2:21a-22: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08D4106-2:21a-23: sbyor ba'i lhung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08D4106-2:21a-24: ji srid du gsog 'jog gi spang ba'i ltung byed
T08D4106-2:21a-25: kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug
T08D4106-2:21a-26: gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08D4106-2:21a-27: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08D4106-2:21a-28: bza' bar bya ba rung ba ma yin pa lag nyar blangs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-29: nang du zhag lon pa dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-31: dge slong gis bcos pa dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-32: rung ba ma yin pa mi sha la sogs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-33: rung ba ma yin pa dang 'dres pa dang /
T08D4106-2:21a-34: brtags pa la gzhan dang 'dres pa /
T08D4106-2:21a-35: dper na dus su rung ba'i zas dang 'dres pa'i
T08D4106-2:21a-36: thun tshod du rung ba la sogs pa'i blta bu'i
T08D4106-2:21a-37: skyon gyis rung ba ma yin pa nyid du gyur
T08D4106-2:21a-38: pa dag ni bza' ba'i phyir 'chad na nyin zhag
T08D4106-2:21a-39: gcig lon na gsog 'jog tu 'gyur pas de dag
T08D4106-2:21a-40: zhag lon par 'chang ba la nyes byas so //
T08D4106-2:21a-41: dus su rung ba'i zas bca' ba lnga dang bza'
T08D4106-2:21a-42: ba lnga byin len byas pa ma zhig ba bza'
T08D4106-2:21a-43: ba'i phyir 'chad na phyed yol na gsog 'jog tu
T08D4106-2:21b-0: 'gyur bas de phyed yol gyi bar du 'chang @21b
T08D4106-2:21b-2: thun tshod du dung ba'i btung ba byin len byas
T08D4106-2:21b-3: pa byin gyis brlabs pa byin len ma zhig par
T08D4106-2:21b-4: btung ba'i phyir 'chang na thun tshod las 'das na
T08D4106-2:21b-5: gsog 'jog tu 'gyur bas de thun tshod las 'das

T08D4106-2:21b-7: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08D4106-2:21b-8: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08D4106-2:21b-9: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08D4106-2:21b-10: de yang dang po yid la sems pa ni sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08D4106-2:21b-11: de nas lus dang ngag gis sbyor ba ni sbyor ba'i nyes byas dngos so //
T08D4106-2:21b-12: de nas mthar thug pa ni spang ba'i lhung byed kyi dngos gzhi'o zhes bya bar shes par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:21b-13: ltung ba med pa ni sman zhag bdun par byin gyis ma brlabs pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:21b-14: skya rengs brgyad pa dang nyin mtshan dang /
T08D4106-2:21b-16: thun tshod ma 'das pa gsog 'jog tu ma gyur pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:21b-17: zhag bdun pa'i 'dru mar la sogs pa rkang pa
T08D4106-2:21b-18: bsku ba la sogs pa'i don gang gi phyir rung
T08D4106-2:21b-19: ba byas pa de'i phyir 'chang ba la ltung ba
T08D4106-2:21b-20: med do // snang blugs pa dang bsku mnye bya ba dag gi gsog 'jog byas kyang rung ngo //
T08D4106-2:21b-22: smyos pa dang sems 'khrugs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:21b-23: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:21b-24: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams
T08D4106-2:21b-25: cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gsog 'jog gi
T08D4106-2:21b-26: spang ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams
T08D4106-2:21b-27: cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:21b-28: sman zhag bdun par byin gyis brlabs pa'i nyi ma
T08D4106-2:21b-29: 'das so cog dge slong la 'di skad ces deng
T08D4106-2:21b-30: phan chad du nyi ma dang po 'das te /
T08D4106-2:21b-31: deng ni nyi ma gnyis pa lags so zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:21b-32: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08D4106-2:21b-33: gsog 'jog gi spang ba ste sum cu pa bshad zin to /

T08D4106-2:21b-36: ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po dag bton zin
T08D4106-2:21b-37: to zhes bya ba ni spang ba'i ltung byed gdon
T08D4106-2:21b-39: spang ba'i ltung byed kyi chos sum cu po dag
T08D4106-2:21b-40: ces bya ba ni sdar bstan pa'i bcu tshan gsum
T08D4106-2:22a-0: po dag go // bton zin to zhes bya ba ni dam bca' @22a * //
T08D4106-2:22a-1: ba'i don gyi mjug bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T08D4106-2:22a-2: nyan pa po rnams spro bar bya ba'i phyir smos so //
T08D4106-2:22a-3: de la bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa dag la
T08D4106-2:22a-4: ji 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes dri'o
T08D4106-2:22a-5: // ji 'di la khyed yongs su dag gam zhes lan gnyis lan gsum du dri'o //
T08D4106-2:22a-6: 'di la tshe dang ldan pa dag yongs su dag

T08D4106-2:22a-13: spang ba'i ltung byed gdon pa bshad zin to /

T08D4106-2:22a-20: chu dang khyim dang bsams pa bzhin dang //
T08D4106-2:22a-21: 'dron mang rkun ma mchod ston no //

T08D4106-2:22a-23: spyi sdom la zhes bya ba ni ltung byed dgu
T08D4106-2:22a-24: bcu la bcu pa phrag dgu 'og nas 'byung ba

T08D4106-2:155a-1: bar bya ba rung ba dag zos pa dang 'thungs pa la ni ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:155a-2: ci tsam gyis na kha dag pa yin zhe na
T08D4106-2:155a-3: kha'i phyi rol mchu gnyis ni lci ba 'am sas
T08D4106-2:155a-4: kun nas bkrus te chus bshal na dag pa yin
T08D4106-2:155a-5: no // kha'i nang na chu mkhur ba do 'am gsum gyis bshal na dag pa yin no //
T08D4106-2:155a-6: lhung bzed ni bsam pa dag pas lan gnyis sam
T08D4106-2:155a-7: gsum bkru bshal byas na sgra mi snyan kyang dag
T08D4106-2:155a-9: lhur bzed kyi rtsi langs pas 'bags pa la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:155a-10: lhung bzed bza' bar bya ba la rag kyang 'bags
T08D4106-2:155a-11: pa med na de la yang nyes pa med do
T08D4106-2:155a-12: // lhung bzed 'dag rdzas sam lci ba 'am sa
T08D4106-2:155a-13: gang yang rung bas lan gsum bkrus pa la snum
T08D4106-2:155a-14: pa nyid yod pa la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:155a-15: lhung bzed dag par byas pa la snum bag gam
T08D4106-2:155a-16: tshon rtsi'i bag langs par gyur na steng gi snum
T08D4106-2:155a-17: bag la sogs pa bsal te spyad pa la nyes
T08D4106-2:155a-18: pa med do // lhung bzed kyi phyogs zas la
T08D4106-2:155a-19: sogs pas 'bags pa'i phyogs de nyi tshe bkrus nas
T08D4106-2:155a-20: spyad pa la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:155a-21: lan tshva tsha chur gyur pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155a-22: 'gyur byed 'gyur byed kyi chur gyur pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155a-23: rnyog pa rnyog chur gyur pa de nad pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155a-24: nad pa ma yin pa thams cad la dus ma
T08D4106-2:155a-25: yin par byin len byas na ma btsags par 'thungs
T08D4106-2:155a-26: pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:155a-27: lan tshva dang 'gyur byed rang gi bya ba mi
T08D4106-2:155a-28: byed pa dag la ni gsog 'jog byas pa 'am
T08D4106-2:155a-29: byin len ma byas par spyad pa la ltung ba
T08D4106-2:155a-30: med do // khron pa la sogs pa 'byung khung
T08D4106-2:155a-31: dag tu zas la sogs pa btab pa mi mngon
T08D4106-2:155a-32: pa ni yod pa'i grangs nyid ma yin pas de
T08D4106-2:155a-33: bstsal te 'thungs pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:155a-34: zas kyi phyogs gcig tu rung bam yin ba 'am /
T08D4106-2:155a-35: byin len ma byas pas 'dren par gyur na phyogs
T08D4106-2:155a-36: de nyi tshe bsal bar bya ba nyid yin gyi
T08D4106-2:155a-37: lhag ma gzhan zos pa la ltung pa med do
T08D4106-2:155a-38: / khva'i mchus reg pa nyid la ni phyogs de nyid dang /
T08D4106-2:155a-39: de'i than 'khor yang bstsal bar bya ba nyid yin no //
T08D4106-2:155a-40: ring ba la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i 'om la
T08D4106-2:155a-41: sogs pa'i rgyun gyis lhung bzed la reg pa ni
T08D4106-2:155a-42: de la reg pa nyid ma yin no //
T08D4106-2:155a-43: nor ba dang brjed pas reg pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155a-44: de gnyis kyi spos pa phyir gzhag pa'i ched du
T08D4106-2:155a-45: gnas kyi thag shin tu nye bar khyer ba ni
T08D4106-2:155a-46: lag nyar blangs pa nyid yin no //
T08D4106-2:155a-47: g-yel bas lag nyar blangs pa nyid dang /
T08D4106-2:155a-48: byin len blangs pa nyid ni de gnyi ga ma yin no //
T08D4106-2:155b-0: byin len stobs @155b pa'i gang zag gis bza' bar
T08D4106-2:155b-1: bya ba 'dzin gyi bar du ma bral ba la
T08D4106-2:155b-2: yang lag nyar blangs pa dang byin len byas pa

T08D4106-2:155b-4: zas su 'brel pa nyid la yang lag nyar blangs ba byin len byas pa nyid med do //
T08D4106-2:155b-5: sdom pa mchog ma yin pa dang ldan pa'i dge slong ma dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-6: sdom pa mchog dang ldan pa'i dge slong ma dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-7: bslab pa byin pa mor ni gsog 'jog byas pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-9: lag nyar blangs pa dag gcig pa nyid pa nyid ma yin no //
T08D4106-2:155b-10: skyes pa dang bud med dag ni phan tshun khyim pa dang 'dra ste /
T08D4106-2:155b-11: dper na khyim pas gsog 'jog byas pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-13: lag nyar blangs pa dag dge slong gi yang ma yin pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-14: dge slong ma'i yang ma yin /
T08D4106-2:155b-15: bslab pa byin pa'i yang ma yin /
T08D4106-2:155b-16: dge slob ma'i yang ma yin pa de bzhin du dge slong ma dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-17: bslab ba byin pa dang dge slong ma mtshan mi mthun pa dag gis gsog 'jog byas pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-19: lag nyar blang pa dag kyang gcig pa nyid ma yin no //
T08D4106-2:155b-20: dge slong dbang ba'i bza' bar bya ba la dge
T08D4106-2:155b-21: tshul dag gis reg pa la lag nyar blang pa
T08D4106-2:155b-22: la sogs pa'i nyes pa med do //

T08D4106-2:155b-24: slong dag gis rig ba la lag nyar blangs pa
T08D4106-2:155b-25: la sogs pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:155b-26: dge slong pa dang dge tshul mal yang de bzhin no //
T08D4106-2:155b-27: dge tshul dbang ba gang yin pa de dge slong
T08D4106-2:155b-28: gis sbed par byed du zin kyang des dge slong
T08D4106-2:155b-30: dge slong gzhan dag la yang rung ba ma yin pa nyid kyi nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:155b-31: dge tshul ma dang dge slong mal yang de bzhin no //
T08D4106-2:155b-35: nang du zhag lon pa dang /
T08D4106-2:155b-37: dge slong gis btsos pa la sogs pa dag bsam
T08D4106-2:155b-38: pa thag pa nas tshig bzhin byed pa gzhan la
T08D4106-2:155b-39: btang rung ba ma yin pa nyid dang bral bar
T08D4106-2:155b-40: 'gyur bas de dag ma blangs par gzhan gyis phyir
T08D4106-2:155b-41: byin te zos pa la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:155b-42: zhing pa dag las 'bras la sogs pa'i thog shas
T08D4106-2:155b-43: mnod pa'i phyir de la dge slong gis rig pa
T08D4106-2:155b-44: dang 'bras la sogs pa mnos pa dag bang ba
T08D4106-2:155b-45: la sogs pa brub pa'i ba'i phyir dge slong gis
T08D4106-2:155b-46: reg pa la chud za ba'i rkyen dag nye bar
T08D4106-2:155b-47: gyur pa'am bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dag med dam
T08D4106-2:156a-1: dag med pa la sogs pa'i rkyen de lta bu
T08D4106-2:156a-2: dag yod na de de dag la dge slong gis
T08D4106-2:156a-3: reg pa la lag nyar blangs ba'i nyes pa med
T08D4106-2:156a-4: do // bza' bar byab bkal ba'i shing rta la
T08D4106-2:156a-5: yang gal te rkyen de lta bu dag yod par
T08D4106-2:156a-6: gyur na de'i tshe kha lo ba'i stan 'ba' zhig
T08D4106-2:156a-7: ma gtogs pa nyid kyi shing rta la dge slong
T08D4106-2:156a-8: gis reg pa la lag nyar blangs pa'i nyes pa
T08D4106-2:156a-9: do // med do // gal te rkyen de lta
T08D4106-2:156a-10: bu dag yod na 'bras la sogs pas gang ba'i
T08D4106-2:156a-11: shing rta'i kha lo ba'i stan ma gtogs pa nyid
T08D4106-2:156a-12: kyi shing rta la dge slong gis reg pa la
T08D4106-2:156a-13: yang lag nyar blangs pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:156a-14: rkyen de lta bu yod par gyur na bza' bar bya ba bcu ga pa'i gru dang /
T08D4106-2:156a-15: 'bras la sogs pas gang ba'i gru dang /
T08D4106-2:156a-17: min pa zhugs pa la yang ru skya ma gtogs
T08D4106-2:156a-18: pa nyid kyi gru la dge slong gis reg pa
T08D4106-2:156a-19: lag nyar blangs pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:156a-20: du skya 'dzin pa'i stan yang de bzhin no //
T08D4106-2:156a-21: dge 'dun dang gang zag gis bza' ba la sogs
T08D4106-2:156a-22: pa sman dag thab tu skol ba'i tshe lud na
T08D4106-2:156a-23: / dang por shing dbri ba dang /
T08D4106-2:156a-25: gos kyi thu ba la sogs pas rlung g-yab pas
T08D4106-2:156a-26: 'bad par bya ba'i thabs kyis zhi bar ma gyur
T08D4106-2:156a-27: na de'i tsho dge slong gis bskyam pa dang /
T08D4106-2:156a-30: dbog pa dag la lag nyar blangs pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:156a-31: dge slong chu klung rgal ba'i phyir ram dam lam
T08D4106-2:156a-32: brgyags khyer ba'i khur tsa ba snyag pa'i phyir chog
T08D4106-2:156a-33: ma 'byor tam / lam brgyags gzhan med na lag
T08D4106-2:156a-34: nyar blangs ba'i lam brgyags bzar rung ste de la
T08D4106-2:156a-36: dge slong lam du zhugs pas lam brgyags khyer ba'i
T08D4106-2:156a-37: khur tsa ba med na sbyin bdag sgro bar bya'o
T08D4106-2:156a-38: // khyer ba med na rang gis bskur ro //
T08D4106-2:156a-39: rang gis khyer ba'i lam brgyags de nyid las gzhan
T08D4106-2:156a-40: la sbyin bas lam brgyags brje zhing bza' bar bya'o
T08D4106-2:156a-41: // de yang ma grub na de bza' bar bya ba nyid do //
T08D4106-2:156a-42: byin len stobs pa med na byin len ma byas pa rang gis khyer ba de 'am /
T08D4106-2:156a-43: gzhan yang bza' bar bya ba nying yin te /
T08D4106-2:156a-45: byin len ma byas pa de gnyis bza' ba yang
T08D4106-2:156a-46: dge slong gang gis sngar nyin gcig zan bcad pa
T08D4106-2:156a-47: byas pa des bza' bar bya ba nyid yin te
T08D4106-2:156a-48: / de bza' ba'i tshad ni nyi ma dang po la spang gang do //
T08D4106-2:156a-49: nyi ma gnyis pa la spar ba do'o //
T08D4106-2:156a-50: nyi ma gsum pa la ni ji tsam gyis chog pa bza' bar bya ba nyid de /
T08D4106-2:156a-51: de la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:156b-0: @156b dge slong zan med pa shin tu bkres pa nyid yin na shing thog dang /
T08D4106-2:156b-1: rtsa ba rung bar ma byas pa dang /
T08D4106-2:156b-2: byin len ma byas pa dang /
T08D4106-2:156b-3: lag nyar blangs pa dag kyang dus ma yin par yang bza' bar bya ba nyid yin la /
T08D4106-2:156b-4: rang gis kyang btogs pa nyid dang /
T08D4106-2:156b-6: btso ba bsgrub par bya ba nyid kyang byar rung la /
T08D4106-2:156b-7: gzhan byed du gzhug tu yang rung ste /
T08D4106-2:156b-8: de la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:156b-9: dge slong zan med pa shin tu bkres pa nyid des byin len ma bstabs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:156b-10: rung bar ma byas pa dang /

T08D4106-2:156b-13: gi sgra mi snyan na grags pa'i yid la byed

T08D4106-2:156b-15: 'dab ma dag snod nyid du spyod pa na byin
T08D4106-2:156b-16: len ma byas pa nyid la nyes pa med do
T08D4106-2:156b-17: // snod nyid du spyod pa 'di la 'dab ma
T08D4106-2:156b-18: dag shing ljon pa la sogs pa dag las brdas
T08D4106-2:156b-19: pa dang ma brdas pa dag ni byin len bstabs
T08D4106-2:156b-20: pa nyid kyi phyir khyad par med do //
T08D4106-2:156b-21: 'dab ma brngas pa dag yod na de nyid spyad do //
T08D4106-2:156b-22: brdas pa gzhan med na ma brngas pa dag kyang spyad de de la nyes pa med do //
T08D4106-2:156b-26: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:156b-27: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams
T08D4106-2:156b-28: cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gsog 'jog gi
T08D4106-2:156b-29: ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi
T08D4106-2:156b-31: bum pa la sogs pa snum can dag snum med
T08D4106-2:156b-32: par bya ba'i phyir chu'i rdzing bu zab mo'i nang
T08D4106-2:156b-33: du nya 'am dus sbal lam sbal pa 'am chu
T08D4106-2:156b-34: srin byis pa gsod dam nya khyi ba dag gis
T08D4106-2:156b-35: ma lus par bldags kyi bar du gzhag par bya'o
T08D4106-2:156b-36: // bum pa la sogs pa snum can dag yang
T08D4106-2:156b-37: na med bsregs pas kyang snum med pa nyid du
T08D4106-2:156b-38: // 'gyur ro // de ltar ma lus par bldags
T08D4106-2:156b-39: pa dang bsregs pa dag 'dag rdzas sam lci bas
T08D4106-2:156b-40: // 'gyur ro // bkru bar bya'o // chu rnyog
T08D4106-2:156b-41: pa can ni gzhan gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung gi bar
T08D4106-2:156b-43: ka ta ka'i 'bras bus chu shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4106-2:156b-44: 'gyur byed kyis kyang chu shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4106-2:156b-45: zan gyis kyang chu shin tu dang bar 'gyur ro //
T08D4106-2:156b-46: zan de mi 'jig par bya ba'i phyir snum gyis bsku'o //
T08D4106-2:156b-47: lag nyar blangs pa la sogs pa'i rdzas ltos pa
T08D4106-2:156b-48: med par btang ba de bza' ba'i phyir blang bar
T08D4106-2:157a-1: blangs pa la sogs pa'i rdzas ltos pa med par
T08D4106-2:157a-2: btang ba de shes bzhin du phyir blang bar mi
T08D4106-2:157a-3: bya'o // dge slong gi lam brgyags khyer ba'i khur
T08D4106-2:157a-4: tsa ba med na sbyin bdag gis de bskur bar

T08D4106-2:157a-6: khyer ba med na rang gis lam brgyags bskur bar bya'o //
T08D4106-2:157a-7: rang gis khyer ba'i lam brgyags de nyid las gzhan
T08D4106-2:157a-8: la sbyin pas lam brgyags brje zhing gzhan bza' bar
T08D4106-2:157a-9: bya'o // dge slong zan med pa shin tu bkres pa nyid na byin len ma bstabs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:157a-10: dus ma yin par za ba la sogs pa rung
T08D4106-2:157a-11: bar bya bdag la rtsom 'dod pa na byang gi

T08D4106-2:157a-14: med na ma bsgribs par mi bya'o //
T08D4106-2:157a-15: skyogs de chu dang bcas pa nyid dam /
T08D4106-2:157a-16: chu med pa nyid na yang kham cad pa nyid du mi gzhag go //
T08D4106-2:157a-17: de'i kha gab ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T08D4106-2:157a-20: sa las byas pa ste de bcang ngo //
T08D4106-2:157a-21: skyogs gzhi shing las byas pa'am /
T08D4106-2:157a-22: rdo las byas pa bcang bar bya'o //
T08D4106-2:157a-23: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08D4106-2:157a-24: gsog 'jog gi ltung byed de sum cu brgyad pa bshad zin to /
T08D4106-2:157a-26: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
T08D4106-2:157a-27: bam po nyi shu dgu pa /
T08D4106-2:157a-28: byin len ma byas bar za ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni bcas pa dang /
T08D4106-2:157a-29: gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T08D4106-2:157a-30: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T08D4106-2:157a-31: mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
T08D4106-2:157a-32: sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
T08D4106-2:157a-33: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po ni thams cad dur khrod pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T08D4106-2:157a-34: de'i lhung bzed kyang dur khrod pa yin /
T08D4106-2:157a-35: chos gos kyang dur khrod pa yin /
T08D4106-2:157a-36: bsod snyoms kyang dur khrod pa yin /
T08D4106-2:157a-37: gnas mal yang dur khrod pa yin te /
T08D4106-2:157a-38: gang gi tshe skye bo phal po che la mi
T08D4106-2:157a-39: ngas byung ba de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa
T08D4106-2:157a-40: nag po chen po tsho ba dang /
T08D4106-2:157a-42: sha dang khrag rgyas par gyur cing de yang dang
T08D4106-2:157a-43: yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par mi
T08D4106-2:157a-44: byed la / gang gi che skye bo phal che
T08D4106-2:157a-45: la mi ngas ma byung ba de'i cho na cho
T08D4106-2:157a-46: dang ldan pa nag po chen po ring pa dang
T08D4106-2:157a-47: nyam chung pa dang skem pa dang skam pa dang
T08D4106-2:157b-0: byed la / / @157b lus ma thob par gyur cing /
T08D4106-2:157b-1: de yang dang yang du grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug par byed de /
T08D4106-2:157b-2: sgo bas de mtshan mar bzung nas 'phags pa nag
T08D4106-2:157b-3: po chen po 'di sha mi za 'am snyam shing
T08D4106-2:157b-4: / thams cad du yang 'phags pa nag po chen po mi sha za 'o zhes sgra grags so //
T08D4106-2:157b-5: mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des /
T08D4106-2:157b-6: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas /
T08D4106-2:157b-7: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
T08D4106-2:157b-9: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08D4106-2:157b-10: de'i bu mo zhig byung nas bsring zhing bskyed de chen mor gyur to //
T08D4106-2:157b-11: dus gzhan zhig na bram ze de dus la bab nas nye du rnams kyis gos sngon po dang /
T08D4106-2:157b-12: ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po dag gis
T08D4106-2:157b-13: khyogs spyil brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregs
T08D4106-2:157b-14: shing dod nas / de'i chung ma dang bu mo gnyis mtha' gcig tu dong ste bsdad pa dang /
T08D4106-2:157b-15: tshe dang ldan pa nag po chen po de'i gdong
T08D4106-2:157b-16: du lta zhing sdod pa mthong nas bu mos smras
T08D4106-2:157b-17: pa / yum 'phags pa nag po chen po 'di
T08D4106-2:157b-18: bya rog mo zhar ma bzhin du nges par rtog
T08D4106-2:157b-19: cing sdod do zhes ngag gi las rtsub po yang
T08D4106-2:157b-21: mnyan yod na bram ze'i khye'u dag gis 'phags pa
T08D4106-2:157b-22: nag po chen po mi sha za'o zhes thos nas
T08D4106-2:157b-23: de dag gis de bgam pa'i phyir de'i cho gcig
T08D4106-2:157b-24: shi ba'i cha lugs su byas nas yud dang 'bru
T08D4106-2:157b-25: mar gyis bskus te khyogs spyil du bzhag nas mnyan
T08D4106-2:157b-26: yod nas phyir dbyung bar brtsams pa dang /
T08D4106-2:157b-27: cho dang ldan pa nag po chen po yang mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs te /
T08D4106-2:157b-28: des de mthong nas bsams pa /

T08D4106-2:281a-19: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'ang de snyed de /
T08D4106-2:281a-20: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08D4106-2:281a-21: ltung ba med pa ni bslab pa la nye bar
T08D4106-2:281a-22: 'jog pa'i dge slong smra ba po 'dul ba dang
T08D4106-2:281a-23: ldan pa'i bslab pa'i yul mngon par shes pa la
T08D4106-2:281a-24: byis pa dang / rmongs pa dang /
T08D4106-2:281a-26: mi mkhas pa ma yin pa nyid yin na yang
T08D4106-2:281a-27: ltung ba 'byin pa pos de ltar 'du shes pa
T08D4106-2:281a-28: nyid med pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:281a-29: yang dag pa kho nar 'dul ba dang ldan pa'i
T08D4106-2:281a-30: bslab pa'i yul mngon par mi shes pa nyid dang
T08D4106-2:281a-34: mi mkhas pa nyid yin na ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:281a-38: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08D4106-2:281a-39: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams
T08D4106-2:281a-40: cad la gnas skabs thams cad du bslab pa la
T08D4106-2:281a-41: nye bar 'jog pa spong ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur
T08D4106-2:281a-42: ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par
T08D4106-2:281a-43: bya'o // bslab pa thun mong gi yul thams cad dge slong ma la yang bsgrags par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:281a-44: dge slong kun shes par 'dod pas kyang bslab pa de la bslab par bya'o //
T08D4106-2:281a-45: dge slong mdo sde 'dzin pa dang /
T08D4106-2:281a-47: ma mo 'dzin pa rnams la yang dri bar bya'o //
T08D4106-2:281a-48: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
